channel.title: Statistics on Assignments for Statistics with R
channel.description: Recent content in Statistics on Assignments for Statistics with R

item.title: R lessons and assignments
item.description: Statistical models in R Graphical procedures in R R packages Demonstration in simulated data Linear regression: single predictor Linear regression: multiple predictors ANOVA Nonparametric methods Reproducible results Assignments Previously, you have learned simple manipulations of vectors and matrices in R, generating data from certain probability distributions, uses of if..else conditionals and looping constructs like for and while, and about constructing and invoking functions in R.
